description.plain:
Beatrice Ilejay Laus (born June 3, 2000 in Iloilo City, Philippines), formerly known as Bea and best known as beabadoobee, is a British-Filipino singer-songwriter based in London, England.

Bea’s music is influenced by artists Alex G, Karen O, and Florist.

Bea released her debut EP Lice on March 1, 2018. In July 2018, Bea would. later sign to label Dirty Hit, an independent record label based in London, England. Her second EP, Patched Up, was released on December 7, 2018. On October 14, 2019, she released her third EP titled Space Cadet.

In 2020, Bea’s 2017 song “Coffee” was sampled in rapper Powfu’s viral Tik Tok hit death bed (coffee for your head), which became a global hit thanks to video app TikTok.

With this newfound attention, Bea’s debut studio album Fake It Flowers was soon to follow, with singles like “Care,” “Sorry,” “Worth It, and “How Was Your Day?” preceding the release.
